fullText: Director Alex Timbers and set designer David Korins have revolutionized and radicalized the capacious Broadway Theatre into a gleaming dance club, walled by dozens of video screens, where audience members—often literally standing in the middle of the action—get swept up in the shifting tides and undertows of history.

keyPhrases.quote: audience members—often literally standing in the middle of the action—get swept up

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review uses strong positive language about the innovative production design and immersive staging, suggesting clear enthusiasm for the creative vision, though this excerpt lacks broader show assessment. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights innovative direction and design, indicating a strong recommendation to see the show.
